data.text:
@jenstirrup @SQLBits Definitely Jen.
I think most of us are feeling the same attending an in-person event after a long-long time, when we were comfortable in our own zone for at least 2 years. Let's catch-up definitely. It will great to meet you @SQLBits

@pragati1187 @SQLBits Thanks, Pragati! Being introverted, I recharge on my own better. Extroverts tend to recharge with other people. We are all different! I will be sure to say hello, though, and it will be nice to meet you #sqlbits
@jenstirrup @SQLBits Come and talk to me on Friday. Happy to make you as comfortable I can 🙂
@Uther1999 Good tip! I did not think of trying that. I'll bear that in mind!
@jenstirrup @Uther1999 We are happy to just have you coming to #SQLBits! (There is a wonderful quiet space if you need to take a time-out)🤫
@jenstirrup @SQLBits I do my best on the phone.  I have found that if I smile while I talk I do well.  Weird but it works for me.

@Uther1999 @SQLBits yes, and I think the hybrid options are one unexpected plus of lockdown. I have delivered eight remote podcasts/webinars in the last two weeks at different events and it's easy to deliver. In-person is just taking a little time to work up to for some, but we will all get there.
@jenstirrup @SQLBits I hear you.  The plague has made me more of a misanthrope.  I can write great presentations.  But I struggle through them.
